column4: Sorry, I don't remember what the error says, I just started using Linux yesterday. This is all new to me, I'll get what the error says in a second.
Ok, it says "An error occurred while loading the archive. Then says Command Line Output, then this: Archive:  /home/clitterdick/Desktop/clamwin-0.95.3-setup.exe
End-of-central-directory signature not found.  Either this file is not
a zipfile, or it constitutes one disk of a multi-part archive.  In the
latter case the central directory and zipfile comment will be found on
the last disk(s) of this archive.
zipinfo:  cannot find zipfile directory in one of /home/clitterdick/Desktop/clamwin-0.95.3-setup.exe or
are you trying to run a .exe in ubuntu?
first of all, you don't really need a AV in Ubuntu
of course, because you are trying to use software for orther plataform
you can install almost any ubuntu app in Applications -> softwrae center
survive in Ubuntu is very easy. Just don't think Windows
well, what do you want to do?
linux av programs only detect windows viruses
There is a "magic" program that allow you to use mot Windows apps
wine, as with most Ubuntu apps, can be found int the Software Centre
The beta release has more compatitbility with more apps, but it is a bit less stable
